data.name: Gooper
data.detailed_description:
Gooper is a challenging 2D puzzle game. Work your way through 200 levels with escalating difficulty and mechanics.



Help Gooper, the frictionless blob, get to the exit of the maze by slinging him between various obstacles. Don't forget to collect Gooper's missing Goo-bits along the way!

  • Massive selection of 200 levels across 8 level packs.
  • Wide range of interconnecting mechanics, escalating the challenge of the puzzles to new levels.
  • Control Gooper with either keyboard, mouse, touch or controller.

Gooper is releasing in Early Access with already 200 levels. Future updates will introduce further levels and mechanics as well as a level creator, allowing players to create and play community levels.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 1.6+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
